thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Feds Should Reimburse Texas for Border Security Expenses, Say Congressmen
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Feds Should Reimburse Texas for Border Security Expenses, Say Congressmen

author: Bob Price
title: EXCLUSIVE: Feds Should Reimburse Texas for Border Security Expenses, Say Congressmen
text: Two key congressional leaders told Breitbart Texas the federal government should reimburse the Lone Star State for border security expenditures. The comments from two committee chairmen follows a request from Texas House Republican leadership requesting reimbursement of $2.8 billion spent by the state on defending the stateâ€™s southern border with Mexico.
